Package ru.rsreu.kuznecovsokolov12.datalayer

Interface SanctionDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OracleSanctionDAO
    public interface SanctionDAO
    The interface provides methods for working with sanctions (blocking and unblocking) imposed on users.

    This interface includes methods for retrieving sanctions received or sent by a specific user, getting the last sanction imposed on a user, retrieving a sanction type by its name, and adding new sanctions.
